productProperties: Color & Odor - Light Yellow With Greenish Tinge With Bland Odor
productDescription: Apricot oil or apricot kernel oil is pressed from the kernels of the Prunus armeniaca. Apricot kernels have an oil content of 40-50%. The oil is similar to almond oil and peach oil, both of which are also extracted from the kernels of the respective fruit.
